metadata.title: CVE-2020-36475 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Mbed TLS before 2.25.0 (and before 2.16.9 LTSand before 2.7.18 LTS). The calculations performed by mbedtls_mpi_exp_modare not limited; thus, supplying overly large parameters could lead todenial of service when generating Diffie-Hellman key pairs.

criterions.comment: mbedtls: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
